author: Special Correspondent
text:
Abhay Kumar Singh, Inspector-General of Police, Enforcement, has been posted as the new Additional Commissioner of Police, Traffic, Chennai Police, in the place of H.M. Jayaram transferred and posted as IGP, Operations, Chennai, in the existing vacancy.

Su. Arunachalam, IGP, on return from his deputation in the Central Bureau of Investigation has been posted as the Additional Commissioner of Police, Headquarters, Chennai Police, in the place of R. Thirugnanam, IGP, transferred and posted as the Commissioner of Police, Tirunelveli city, in the existing vacancy, according to an official release.
title: IPS officers get new postings
